This page offers a list of features that will be implemented in a future version of MPMPD.

= Future feature list=

These features are likely to be implemented in a future version of MPMPD:

  # The possibility to download songs selected in the server playlist.
  # Move icon to system tray on minimize (currently already implemented in GTK-client).
  # Download tracks in a separate thread (currently already implemented in GTK-client).
  # Provide a task-tray icon for the Server, with a better output window. (especially imortant on windows)
  # Fix it until it works.
